description: SOP for handling cashout-related customer issues

scenarios.root_cause: User's withdrawable cash is less than cashout amount
scenarios.resolution: Check withdrawable vs total balance. Explain pending settlements. Advise to wait for settlement or reduce cashout amount.
scenarios.script_en: Please check your Withdrawable Cash balance. Some funds may be in pending settlement (T+2 for stocks, T+1 for crypto). Once settled, you can withdraw the full amount.

scenarios.scenario: Bank cashout failed — bank account issue
scenarios.root_cause: Bank account number invalid, account closed, or name mismatch
scenarios.resolution: Verify bank account details. Check if bank account is still active. Ensure name matches KYC.
scenarios.script_en: Your cashout may have failed due to a bank account issue. Please verify: 1) Account number is correct, 2) Account is still active, 3) Name on bank account matches your Pluang account.

scenarios.root_cause: Bank partner API timeout or network issue
scenarios.resolution: Check transaction status in admin panel. If stuck >24hrs, escalate to ops team. Refund may be auto-processed.
scenarios.script_en: Your cashout is being processed. Bank transfers can take up to 1x24 hours. If you haven't received the funds after 24 hours, please contact us again.

scenarios.root_cause: Normal bank processing time (up to 1x24 hours for bank transfer)
scenarios.resolution: Explain normal processing times. Bank transfers: up to 1x24 hours. GoPay: usually instant.
scenarios.script_en: Bank transfers typically take up to 1x24 hours to process. GoPay withdrawals are usually instant. Please allow the full processing time before contacting us again.

scenarios.scenario: GoPay cashout failed — GoPay account issue
scenarios.root_cause: GoPay account not verified, number mismatch, or GoPay service down
scenarios.resolution: Verify GoPay account status. Check if phone number matches. Check GoPay service status.
scenarios.script_en: Your GoPay cashout may have failed because: 1) Your GoPay account needs to be verified, 2) The phone number doesn't match, or 3) GoPay service is temporarily unavailable.

scenarios.scenario: User asks about cashout fees or tax deduction
scenarios.root_cause: Applicable taxes or fees deducted from cashout
scenarios.resolution: Explain tax structure: gains on gold/stocks may have applicable tax. Show breakdown of fees vs tax.
scenarios.script_en: The cashout amount may differ from your balance due to applicable taxes on investment gains. You can view the detailed breakdown in your transaction history.

scenarios.root_cause: RDN account sync issue or settlement pending
scenarios.resolution: Check RDN balance sync. Verify settlement status. May need to escalate to ops for manual reconciliation.
scenarios.script_en: RDN (Securities Account) cashouts require settled funds. Please wait for T+2 settlement on stock sales, then retry the cashout.

scenarios.root_cause: Cashout amount exceeds daily or monthly withdrawal limit
scenarios.resolution: Explain cashout limits. Suggest splitting into multiple transactions or waiting for next period.
scenarios.script_en: You may have reached your daily/monthly withdrawal limit. Please try a smaller amount or wait until the next day/month to continue your withdrawal.

symptoms: Cashout failed but balance not restored
scenarios.resolution: Check refund status in admin panel. Auto-refunds usually process within 1-3 business days. Escalate if >3 days.
scenarios.script_en: If your cashout failed, the funds will be automatically refunded to your Pluang account within 1-3 business days. Please check your balance after this period.

symptoms: Only part of cashout amount refunded
scenarios.resolution: Explain that some fees may have been deducted. Check actual refund amount vs original cashout.
scenarios.script_en: The refund amount may differ slightly from your original cashout request due to applicable fees. Please check the detailed transaction history for a full breakdown.
